participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Dedicated, protective, family-oriented, and passionate about his job.
participant_1.background: I put on my uniform and got ready to protect my city. I love family time. I never work more than 4 days in a row. I love the walking dead. I love spending time with my daughter and watching her grow into a smart, independent young woman.

participant_2.name: David
participant_2.background: I'm going to try to talk to my spouse about spending more time together this weekend, even though I know it's a long shot. My beer gut is so huge I have not seen my feet in two years. I started a small business so I could spend more time with my family. I get my creative energy from listening to music and trying to create my own. I have been working the same job for two years.

content.text: What are you up to today?
I just got home from work and I'm going to try to talk to my spouse about spending more time together this weekend.
Nice! I'm going to put on my uniform and get ready to protect my city.
That sounds exciting! I'm not brave enough to be a cop.
It's not always exciting, but it's a job I'm proud to do.
It's important to have a job you're proud of. I started a small business so I could spend more time with my family.
That's great! What kind of business?
I'm a music producer. I get my creative energy from listening to music and trying to create my own.
That sounds like a really cool job! I love music.
I'm going to head out now. Have a great weekend!
